column6: Venom finally takes a trip home! Can't wait to meet its folks. Or...the thing it spawned from...or whatever... But with the symbiote becoming more and more uncontrollable, this may be seriously bad news for the Guardians. I mean...come on guys! Can't they have ONE nice vacation? Always with the monsters and aliens and lasers and stuff...
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | artist:Valerio Schiti | penciller (cover):Christian Ward
